website_summaries.verdict: Because of the breathable leather and lightweight sock liner in this shoe, it will keep your feet feeling comfortable even during a long day of playing ball.
pros: The rubber outsole has a traction pattern that provides an excellent grip on the court
Delivers a nice mix of comfort and support
cons: UA shoes sometimes have an odd fit
May not provide the longevity you expect out of a shoe from a major brand

customer_reviews.title: Runs too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 10 for my son, and the description says it's true to size, got them in, and no... they're too small. His toes were right up to the end. If you buy them, buy 1/2 size to next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Walton

customer_reviews.title: No more rain getting in toe area on walks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my son over others as they have the solid leather toe area rather than mesh that allows water in on rainy days. My son gets smelly feet and shoes that allow them to get soggy are the worst! These stay good and dry. Look nice, too. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Maria

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was narrow and squeezed the toes. Part of the problem might be caused by stiff and non-flexible material on the top part of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, great.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son, and he loved them. So, far he has been wearing them daily going to school and playing basketball. He says they are fine, and he's very happy with them. And they look good.
customer_reviews.author: Romin Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Discription says shoe not shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. when the package arrived we opened it up to find a single left shoe. There was no right shoe. Extremely disappointed. And it's now sold out..... wonder who ordered this and got just the right shoe.....
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Totally surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about buying shoes from Under Armour but I can see without any hesitation that the shoes are worth every penny. In fact I’m trying to find them in a different color so I can have a couple of pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sent Back
customer_reviews.text: the shoe looked great, fit well but the material was like a rubber boot! I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gale L. Lasko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable, stylish, AND affordable! What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Steve Penner

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes and look to be great quality ( no glue marks) however they run small. So if u are a 101/2 get an 11.
customer_reviews.author: nicki renee

customer_reviews.title: fells alittle tight
customer_reviews.text: they feel like half a size small. I brought at 14 but its still feel comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sneakers for my son to play basketball and he loves them. They fit perfectly and I will get another pair for my older son. Good for the price and good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: SunflowerQ

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Good basketball shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old wore these for basketball and they fit and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6’2 1 /2” and very slim. Size 16 shoes are very hard to find that fits him well. These did the tick and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Koko love

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son is super happy with ear shoes- fit great, and look nice! He claims he jumps much higher and just won his last basketball game in them, so it must be true! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Right fit for a growing teen
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he loves them. Not only because they fit, but because they’re his favorite colors in one pair of shoes. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Why side moldings
customer_reviews.text: Did not like how it molds your foot with the side moldings that really bugs the inside of my ark.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Torn shoe
customer_reviews.text: Only had the shoe for a couple days, and they became defective!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes wish they were a little wider but other than that great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Dustin R.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run small, son wears 8.5 and these are extremely tight on him. I wear an 8 in men’s and they are snug on me.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: they don't secure the ankle enough
customer_reviews.text: the laces end pretty low from the ankles and they don't secure enough the foot to prevent that doesn't move inside the sneakers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: They are great and work as designed. I use them to play pickleball.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: You got break them in just like any other shoes
customer_reviews.text: They fit a little tight at first but they are fine afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: It’s an excellent shoe. Definitely meant for a wider foot but one of the most comfortable shoes I’ve played in
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Kesler

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect shoe for almost any occasion
customer_reviews.text: It was very comfortable for my 11 year old son
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: They are super ugly in person like super super ugly
customer_reviews.text: They are super ugly in person like super super ugly
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Order bigger if you buy
customer_reviews.text: order a size&half to big and there still too small
customer_reviews.author: Brojawa

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneaker & very comfortable and light!! Great support! Size is right on, don’t listen to other reviews!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Lockdown 4 Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Molded synthetic upper for a responsive fit & fast look. Perforated leather delivers enhanced breathability. Lightweight, super-breathable sockliner provides underfoot cushioning & support. Injection molded EVA midsole delivers a lightweight & responsive ride. Rubber outsole with multi-level adaptive traction patterns to provide exceptional on-court movement & control that won't wear down. Weight: 13.2 oz.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-top from arch
Injection molded EVA midsole delivers a lightweight & responsive ride
Rubber outsole with multi level adaptive traction patterns to provide exceptional on court movement & control that won't wear down
Molded synthetic upper for a responsive fit & fast look
Lightweight, super breathable sockliner provides underfoot cushioning & support
